nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Snow and patchy freezing drizzle. Cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. Northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely and patchy freezing drizzle before noon. Cloudy. High near 28, with temperatures falling to around 22 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 7, with temperatures rising to around 10 overnight. Northeast wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a high near 12. Northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -5. Northeast wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 11. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 5. South wind around 10 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Partly sunny, with a high near 33. Southwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. West wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before noon, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. Southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 19. North wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 6. North wind around 10 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 20.
